item.description:
This is the first of our bimonthly seminars on Introduction to Bicycle Commuting, taught by experienced members of the Portland Bicycle Commuting Meetup. A variety of general topics will be covered, such as bike requirements, carrying stuff, logistics, and a bit about Traffic Safety. (Traffic Safety will be covered in more detail in its own seminar next month.)

This month's seminar will be taught by Russell Erickson, a recent returnee to bike commuting, who rides a 12-mile round-trip from Cape Elizabeth to Portland 3-5 days a week.

For more online information about beginning bike commuting, see

  • Our Getting Started page
  • Our Carrying Things by Bike page
  • Our Bike Trails and Maps page
  • Our PowerPoint presentation on the topic
item.name: Introduction to Bicycle Commuting
